description: Apollo - Enhanced Sunshine game streaming server with virtual display support

script: Write-Host 'Apollo game streaming server installer downloaded to:' -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host 'Note: Apollo installer requires administrator privileges.' -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host '1. Right-click on Apollo-0.4.8.exe and select "Run as administrator"' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host '2. Or use: Start-Process -FilePath "Apollo-0.4.8.exe" -Verb RunAs' -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host '3. After installation, configure at http://localhost:47990' -ForegroundColor White

notes: INSTALLER PACKAGE: This downloads and runs the Apollo game streaming server installer.
Apollo is an enhanced fork of Sunshine with additional features:
- Virtual display support with SudoVDA integration
- HDR and wide color gamut support
- Double refresh rate mode for reduced stuttering
After installation, configure Apollo via web interface at http://localhost:47990
Remember to quit Apollo before upgrading to prevent issues.
Check the Best Practices wiki for optimal configuration.
